items.sentence: Both Tom and Mary were too drunk to drive home.
I admire anyone who can do something like that.
How can anyone be satisfied with these results?
You've been asking the wrong kind of questions.
I don't think it worthwhile to do such a thing.
I've lost my pen. Will you help me look for it?
Tom asked if he was really required to do that.
Tom asked if he really needed to wear a helmet.
Tom and I were sitting together at the concert.
Tom and I looked at each other for a long time.
